snippet: The church is grappling with a wave of disillusionment among members who encountered information that sabotages what they were taught about their faith.
abstract: Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints is grappling with wave of disillusionment among members who encounter information on the Internet that sabotages what they have been taught about their faith; decision by some within Mormon church to go public with their disaffection is a sign that it faces serious challenges not just from outside but also from skeptics within the faith.
lead_paragraph: The church is grappling with a wave of disillusionment among members who encountered information that sabotages what they were taught about their faith.

headline.main: Some Mormons Search the Web and Find Doubt
headline.print_headline: Some Mormons Search the Web And Find Doubt
